title: Paul Reubens Will Reprise His ‘Batman Returns’ Role On ‘Gotham’
text:
Paul Reubens Will Reprise His ‘Batman Returns’ Role On ‘Gotham’ 
Published By: Uproxx - Today 
Robin Lord Taylor (who plays the Penguin on Gotham ) dropped some amusing casting news at the show’s New York Comic Con panel on Sunday. P...
